comments.en:
Probably one of the most expensive winprinters, the specification says "ESC/Page S (Host based)". The free laser printer drivers published by Epson for their other AL-and EPL models do not cover this printer.

Perhaps this printer works with the non-free (but free of charge) Epson Avasys Photo Image Print System Plus for the Epson AL-C900 (this printer uses also ESC/Page S).

Consumables/Refills:
